name: Demolition Derby 3D:RC Cars Free
description:
It's a time to crush all other drivers with your RC car. A war of demolition begun when you start engine. So keep your foot on accelerator tap speed and smash all the cars in a way of you. Demolition derby RC car is an action packed game with the goal to smash other drivers or blast their cars by continuous hitting and feel the thrill of real destruction. Drive with high speed and destroy your opponents to unlock your desire demolition RC car.

Features:
Real simulation of demolition rc cars. Fantastic effects of collision and car damage. Highly dynamic cars with tuned handling. Excellent environment with loads of cars. Elegant sound effects of car hitting. Select your desire car with a variety of cars.
